alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fairfield, north central Richland and west central Kershaw Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 823 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Winnsboro to near Lake Wateree State Park to Longtown. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winnsboro, Fairfield County Airport, Lake Carolina, Villages at Sandhill, Longtown, Jenkinsville, Lake Wateree State Park, Blythewood, Ridgeway, Lebanon Fire Station, Fairfield County Detention Center, Rion, Winnsboro Mills, Fairfield Elementary School, Smallwood and White Oak. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 24 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
